item.title: Performance Fastburn & Slowburn
item.description: Introduction: Discovering our SLIs & SLOs Our system at Terminus has a lot of interconnected and interdependent services. With an ever growing system, how would we know our system is reliable with these compounding factors? How do we define that our service is up? “Up” meaning reliability and availability which are determined by our SLIs & SLOs. For a little background on what SLIs & SLOs are please click here and here.
